body_html:
Did anybody know how to fix it step by step? I faced the same problem (mac ox, python 2.7). And

pip install -U numpy

didn't work.

Here is what I found in my mac.

  • /System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/Extras/lib/python -> numpy 1.8
  • /System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.6/Extras/lib/python -> numpy 1.6
  • ls /Library/Python/2.7/site-packages -> numpy 1.10.2

my python (default) version 2.7.10

Many thanks

body:
Did anybody know how to fix it step by step? I faced the same problem (mac ox, python 2.7). And 

``` shell
pip install -U numpy
```

didn't work. 

Here is what I found in my mac. 
- /System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/Extras/lib/python -> numpy 1.8
- /System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.6/Extras/lib/python -> numpy 1.6
- ls /Library/Python/2.7/site-packages -> numpy 1.10.2 

my python (default) version 2.7.10 

Many thanks
